attributes.action: not to convert the motorway hard shoulders into extra lanes and Ruth Kelly should resign for proposing such a scheme.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It seems clear that what is being proposed by Ruth Kelly, Transport Secretary, is utterly ludicrous. The inherent dangers, logistical and traffic management problems, not to mention the cost(£)and lives(!)have not been thought through or even considered. This is possibly the most preposterous proposal this Government has ever put forward.  
Ruth Kelly cleary is not competent to hold position as Transport Secretary and should resign or be sacked from this job.
